TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 类可封装 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的节点或对象。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类可以绑定到对象，也可以读取和更新属性。Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes. ，以及帮助器类，可提供对生命周期管理和导航方法的支持。, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods. 其中包括创建、删除、重命名、移动子节点和枚举子级。These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 修改节点后，必须提交更改，以便将其保存到树。After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 有关详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information, see the property. 可用于访问架构条目中的常规条目和某些（但不是全部）信息。 can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries. Active Directory 域服务层次结构最多包含数千个节点。The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes. 每个节点都表示一个对象，如网络打印机或域中的用户。Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain. 公司网络会不断变化，因为雇用了新员工并添加了网络打印机和计算机等对象。Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added. Active Directory 服务接口（ADSI）技术提供了以编程方式将这些对象添加到目录树的方式。Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree. 若要在层次结构中创建目录条目，请使用 属性。To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the property. 属性是一个提供 方法的集合，通过该方法，可将节点直接添加到当前绑定到的父节点下的集合中。The property is a collection that provides an method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 向集合添加节点时，必须指定新节点的名称，以及要与节点关联的架构模板的名称。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 例如，你可能希望使用标题为 "Computer" 的架构将新计算机添加到层次结构中。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. 此类还包含属性缓存，这对于优化网络流量很有用。This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic. 若要使用属性缓存，请参阅 属性。To use attribute caching, see the property. 与 组件关联的类可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序一起使用。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 某些当前提供程序是 Internet Information Services （IIS）、轻型目录访问协议（LDAP）、Novell NetWare 目录服务（NDS）和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 假设您在使用此类之前，您大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information, see the namespace overview.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类可绑定到指定的本机 Active Directory 域服务对象。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that binds to the specified native Active Directory Domain Services object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使程序可以通过本机 API 使用实现 IADs 接口的本机 Active Directory 域服务对象的方法和 属性。This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API. 有关 IADs 接口的详细信息，请参阅[IADs](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nn-iads-iads)一文。For more information about the IADs interface, see the [IADs](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nn-iads-iads) article.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Children As DirectoryEntries

summary.span: 获取 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中此节点的子项。

span.span: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中此节点的子项。

span.span: A object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子条目只是此节点的直接子级。The child entries are only the immediate children of this node. 使用此属性可在层次结构中查找、检索或创建目录条目。Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy. 此属性是一个集合，它提供了一个 方法，通过该方法，你可以将节点直接添加到当前绑定到的父节点下的集合中。This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 向集合添加节点时，必须指定新节点的名称，以及要与节点关联的架构模板的名称。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 例如，你可能希望使用标题为 "Computer" 的架构将新计算机添加到层次结构中。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，会在本地将更改保存到缓存中。By default, changes are made locally to a cache. 修改或添加节点后，必须调用 方法来提交更改，以便将更改保存到树。After you modify or add a node, you must call the method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 如果在调用 之前调用 ，则对属性缓存的任何未提交的更改都将丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 方法以及 属性。For more information, see the and methods, and the property.

span.span: To retrieve the child entries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 对象并释放与此组件关联的任何系统资源。

span.span: Closes the object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以释放非托管系统资源，而无需等待垃圾回收。Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection. 调用 后，对 的任何操作都可能引发异常。Following a call to , any operations on the might raise exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CommitChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 将目录项所作更改保存到基础目录存储中。

span.span: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，对属性所做的更改将在本地对缓存进行，并且在第一次读取后缓存属性值。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 对缓存所做的更改包括对属性的更改，以及对 的调用（如果这是新创建的条目）。Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to (if this is the newly created entry). > [!CAUTION] > 如果在调用 之前调用 ，则对属性缓存的任何未提交的更改都将丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. ## 安全性Security - 使用 类来读取、写入、删除、更改和添加到 Active Directory 域服务层次结构。Use the class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 关联的枚举：。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: To commit the changes.

summary.span: 创建此项的副本。

span.span: The specified is not a container.

permission.span: 创建指定 对象的副本。

span.span: To make a copy of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteTree() cil managed

summary.span: 从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中删除此项及其整个子树。

span.span: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Active Directory 服务接口（ADSI）系统提供的提供程序中，只有轻型目录访问协议（LDAP）当前支持此操作。Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation. > [!CAUTION] > 将从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中删除条目及其整个子树。The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. ## 安全性Security - 使用 从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中删除条目。Use for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 关联的枚举：。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: The specified is not a container.
To delete the entry and its children.

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `true``disposing` 参数时，此方法将释放此 对象引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this object references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object. 有关 和 方法的详细信息，请参阅[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information about the and methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NativeObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ NativeObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取本机 Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 对象。

span.span: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
The native ADSI object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当要使用 COM 接口时，可以使用此属性强制转换用于实现 IADs 接口的本机 Active Directory 域服务对象。Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface. 有关 IADs 接口的详细信息，请参阅[IADs](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nn-iads-iads)一文。For more information about the IADs interface, see the [IADs](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nn-iads-iads) article. 此对象适用于无法通过单独 类完成的高级方案。This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the classes alone. 若要使用它，需要从 IADs 家族导入一个 COM 接口，然后将此属性强制转换为该接口。To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path for this .
The path of this object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在网络环境中唯一标识此项。The property uniquely identifies this entry in a networked environment. 始终可以使用此 检索此项。This entry can always be retrieved using this . 设置 将从目录存储中检索新项;它不会更改当前绑定项的路径。Setting the retrieves a new entry from the directory store; it does not change the path of the currently bound entry. 与 组件关联的类可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序一起使用。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 某些当前提供程序是 Internet Information Services （IIS）、轻型目录访问协议（LDAP）、Novell NetWare 目录服务（NDS）和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 标识提供程序的 部分（在 "：//" 之前）区分大小写。The section of the that identifies the provider (precedes "://") is case-sensitive. 例如，"LDAP://" 或 "WinNT://"。For example, "LDAP://" or "WinNT://". 属性的语法因提供程序而异。The syntax for the property varies according to the provider. 一些常见的情况有：Some common scenarios are: WinNTWinNT - 连接到计算机上的组。Connect to a group on a computer. 例如，"WinNT://**\<域名 >/\<计算机名称 >/\<组名称 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT://**\<计算机名称 >/\<组名称 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 连接到计算机上的用户。Connect to a user on a computer. 例如，"WinNT://**\<域名 >/\<计算机名称 >/\<用户名 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT://**\<计算机名称 >/\<用户名 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 连接到计算机上的服务。Connect to services on a computer. 例如，"WinNT://**\<域名 >/\<计算机名称 >/\<服务名称 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT://**\<计算机名称 >/\<名称 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 发现网络上的所有域。Discover all domains on the network. 例如，通过枚举此项的子级，可以找到域。For example, "WinNT:" The domains can be found by enumerating the children of this entry. LDAPLDAP - 连接到域中的组。Connect to a group in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN =\<组名称 >，CN =\，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >,..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN =\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 连接到域中的用户。Connect to a user in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN =\<完全用户名 >，CN =\，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >,..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 连接到域中的计算机。Connect to computers in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN =\<计算机名称 >，CN =\<计算机 >，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >,..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". IISIIS - 连接到 Web 目录。Connect to a Web directory. 例如，"IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\"。For example, "IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\". 若要使用 LDAP 绑定到当前域，请使用路径 "LDAP://RootDSE"，然后获取默认命名上下文并重新绑定该条目。To bind to the current domain using LDAP, use the path "LDAP://RootDSE", then get the default naming context and rebind the entry. 例如：For example: ```csharp String str = ent.Properties["defaultNamingContext"][0]; DirectoryEntry domain = new DirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + str); ``` 有关详细信息，请参阅提供程序的文档和[使用 Active Directory 服务接口](/windows/desktop/adsi/using-adsi)一文。For more information, see the documentation for your provider and the [Using Active Directory Service Interfaces](/windows/desktop/adsi/using-adsi) article.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As PropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象的 Active Directory 域服务属性。

span.span: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含此项所设属性。

span.span: A object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未初始化属性， 将调用 ADSI interface [IADs：： Get](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-get)方法以从缓存中检索值。If the property is not initialized, calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-get) method to retrieve the value from the cache. 如果尚未加载基础缓存， [IADs：：](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-get)将隐式调用[IADs：： GetInfo](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-getinfo)。If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-get) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-iads-getinfo). 此方法从基础目录存储区加载未在缓存中设置的受支持属性的值。This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store. 对的后续调用 仅检索缓存中的属性值。Subsequent calls to retrieves the property values in the cache only. 若要控制属性缓存加载，请调用 。To control property cache loading, call . **注意**不支持将 属性用于 [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)]的 Active Directory 客户端扩展（DSClient）。**Note** The property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)].

span.span: To retrieve the properties.

summary.span: 将此 对象的属性值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshCache() cil managed

summary.span: 将此 对象的属性值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 对属性缓存的任何未提交的更改都将丢失。Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 使用 方法可将更改保存到目录存储区。Use the method to persist changes to the directory store.

permission.span: 若要刷新属性缓存，则为。

span.span: To refresh the property cache.

span.span: An array of the specified properties.

summary.span: 将指定属性的值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the values of the specified properties into the property cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 对属性缓存的任何未提交的更改都将丢失。Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 使用 将更改保存到目录存储区。Use to persist changes to the directory store.

permission.span: 若要刷新属性缓存，则为。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsePropertyCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UsePropertyCache : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在每次运算之后是否应提交缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.

value.span: 如果在每次运算之后不应提交缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，对属性所做的更改将在本地对缓存进行，并且在第一次读取后缓存属性值。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 当 `true` 属性时， 对象属性的访问速度会更快。When the property is `true`, access to the object's properties is faster. 将此设置为 `false` 会导致在每次操作后提交缓存。Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation. 如果 属性 `true` 并且要提交缓存的更改，请调用 方法。If the property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the method. 若要在对目录进行更改后更新缓存中的值，请调用 方法。To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the method. > [!CAUTION] > 如果在调用 之前调用 ，则对属性缓存的任何未提交的更改都将丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. > [!NOTE] > Internet Information Services （IIS）提供程序不支持每次操作后提交缓存。The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.
